ygData.subject: Re: 1hb weapons that are light enough to use...
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to really annoy Monks, I thought I might Mention this I had decided to try and raise my 1hb about the same time that I was trying to get the components
ygData.messageBody:
Just to really annoy Monks, I thought I might Mention this

I had decided to try and raise my 1hb about the same time that I was trying
to get the components for the Treant gloves
I had Picked up a couple of Cracked staffs from gobbies in the Maze, and
would occasionally wander in RunneyEye and pound on the warlord to raise my
skill

I started at skill 6 at level 30 :(

well I finally got the Humerous Handled Mace from the elusive Alchemist

when I looked at the Mace, to my suprise it was
1hb 5 Damage and 29 Delay ( not sure on the Delay)
but it only weighs 1.5 lbs.

well I do not have my gloves yet

I tossed the Cracked Staves

wielded my 1.5 pound mace and have been smashing harriers and Avocets -

I am still under 15 pounds total weight

I guess when I finally max out my 1hb (I am currently at 90) I will head on
over to Kerra ridge and Finish getting my gloves, ( I really do not want to
try and get another Mace ( it would not be fair to other monks who have not
gotten one mace yet)) so once I max my skill, I guess I will picked up a
Cracked staff or something, each time I level and pound for a while until I
max it

too bad the Mace has to be given up to get the gloves :(

Caene
Mith Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Tim Perkins <tperkins@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 4:42 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] 1hb weapons that are light enough to use...


> From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
>
> I have heard that the runor is the plane of sky (POS) heh will drop alot
of
> weapons jewelry and miscilaneous (sp) items. A group from my guild is
> planning on going into Sky Nekkid tonight.
>
> Kizmet Bayashi
> Monk of the 48th...
> E-Marr
> Da`Kor
